name: Set message based on event type
function 8
build URL
func:
let count = msg.payload.hours * 12
let base_url = global.get("hassio.base_url","file")
let url_part1 = "/api/unifiprotect/thumbnail/" 
let nvr = msg.nvr_id
let eventId = msg.data.new_state.attributes.event_id
msg.url = base_url + url_part1 + nvr + "/" + eventId
return msg;
